creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons and Dr. Rosa Lynn Pinkus
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two red panels with blue stripes, sewn together; central dark purple blocks with geometric circles, X's, chevrons and zigzags in pinks, blues and gold; long purple tassels at corners
medium: Cotton, silk; supplementary weft patterning, embroidery
title: Man's ceremonial tzute
